剷字的基本解释

剷
chǎn
同“铲”。

剷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《洪武正韻》楚簡切，上産］
(1)削除；铲除。
(2)少。
(3)犹崭。异常。
(4)见“剷地”。

剷字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剷； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页143第15
【正韻】楚?切，音產。【杜牧·原十六衞】府兵內剷。【正字通】與剗同。又與鏟?通。又【正韻】初諫切，音鏟。義同。

暂无。

shovel
Basic explanation of words
shovel
chǎn
Same as "shovel".
shovel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎn］
["Hongwu Zhengyun" Chu Jian cut, high production]
(1) Cut; eradicate.
(2) Less.
(3) Still new. abnormal.
(4) See "Shoveling Ground".
shovel
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Knife word department] 　 shovel; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 143 to 15
[Zheng Yun] Chu? Cut, sound production. 【Du Mu·Former Sixteen Guards】Shovel inside the house. 【Zhengzitong】Same as 刬. It also communicates with the shovel. Also [Zhengyun] first admonishment cut, sound shovel. The same meaning.
